sentences: The contact group on implementation of FCCC Articles 4.8 and 4.9 and matters relating to Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects) discussed the recent workshop held in Bonn.
Several delegates called for analysis on the effects of response measures for all developing countries, not only oil producing countries.
Delegates were invited to submit written proposals on possible actions to be synthesized by the co-chairs.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
